name: notarization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of having a public official such as a lawyer sign a letter or other document : We cannot accept applications without prior notarization. The state no longer charges a fee for paper notorizations.
More examplesFewer examplesAll that notarization really means is that a notary has seen the document, not that they approve of the content.The lawyer was charged with forgery for faking notarization of the mortgage agreement.Claimants are responsible for the notorization of all paperwork.
